title: Royal Enfield sales rise 11% to 86,978 units in September
description: Royal Enfield's total wholesales rose 11% year-on-year to 86,978 units in September, driven by recent launches like the 2024 Classic 350. Domestic dispatches increased by 7%, while exports more than doubled. CEO B Govindarajan attributes the growth to continuous innovation and strong rider interest.
